problem_text: It is known that the group Zω has a subgroup whose dual is free abelian of rank 2ℵ0 (see 17.24 in Archive). Does Zω have a subgroup whose dual is free abelian of still larger rank (the largest possible being 22ℵ0)? This is Question 11 in (G. M. Bergman, Portugaliae Math., 69 (2012) 69–84). G. M. Bergman
